New Records: Brandon Nimmo has reached 800 hits in his career.
Key Match Events: Iglesias puts Mets ahead in the 9th, top Diamondbacks.
Randal Grichuk went 2-3 with a home run and 2 RBIs.
Francisco Lindor hit a home run in the game.
José Buttó secured the win for the Mets with a scoreless inning.
Justin Martinez took the loss for the Diamondbacks.
